When I constructed a cyclical dependency between services it was correctly detected, however, the container fails with a StackOverflowException when trying to construct a pretty-printed error message:
The culprit is the method
Castle.MicroKernel.Handlers.AbstractHandler.ObtainDependencyDetails() : String
in the binary version from the website, Assembly: Castle.MicroKernel, Version 1.0.0.2
